job_description:
**_Duties_**
  

  * This position shall wok on cutting edge computer vision & machine learning problems with emphasis on developing automation solutions for off highway vehicles
  * The position shall provide Engineering leadership for Computer Vision Machine Learning based application development projects
  * Learn and implement state of the art best practices to drive efficiencies in CVML development
  * Stay abreast of the latest technological changes in the areas of Computer vision & machine learning and introduces the same to the team
  * Lead a Project team and drive project execution, within acceptable cost, quality and schedule
  * Understand product requirements, prepare concepts/proposals, define execution plan, align stakeholders on delivery schedules
  * Creates, analyzes technical requirements to determine the best technical solution for complex problems or projects of difficult scope
  * Resolve software/schedule conflicts arising out of integration
  * Facilitates communication with stakeholders for roadblocks, dependencies and ensures team stays productive
  * Ensure quality deliverables from the team, perform design / code reviews, develop plans on test strategy
  * Keeps management aware about project progress and potential risks in advance to ensure execution of necessary actions
  * Plays an active role in talent development of the team with focused mentoring of team members
  * Collaborate with other functions as required


  

**_Required_**
  

  * 8+ plus year of excellent experience in the areas of Computer Vision & Machine Learning


  

**_Deep Knowledge & Experience Of_**
  

  * Image processing, Computer Vision, Machine / Deep Learning -EITHER 1
  * Cameras -Mono camera, stereo camera OR LIDAR
  * Stereo Camera & Lidar 3D point cloud processing, 2D and 3D coordinate rotation and translation
  * Mono & Stereo Camera Calibration & Imaging
  * 3D reconstruction & depth imaging
  * Simultaneous Localization & Mapping SLAM-opt
  * Machine learning techniques and algorithms
  * Building production-grade Neural Network models using Computer vision techniques


  

**_Proficiency In_**
  

  * Embedded C++- mandate Python/ Matlab
  * Image Processing and computer vision libraries like OpenCV and MATLAB image processing and computer vision toolbox
  * Programming with strong experience in Data structures, algorithms and software development
  * Either of the Deep Learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Caffe MxNet- Any 1
  * Common Data science tool kits
  * Embedded OS, Linux
  * Deploying Computer vision and machine learning algorithms on edge computing hardware
  * Sensor fusion of Camera, LIDAR, RADAR, GNSS etc- knowledge
  * Strong mathematical background
  * Ability to perform complex engineering work with minimal guidance
  * Ability to guide and direct work to other members in the team
  * Excellent verbal and written communication, and presentation skills
  * Comfortable working with diverse, multi-disciplinary teams, across multiple time zones


  

**_Desired_**
  

  * Experience in Robotics
  * Strong Embedded Software development fundamentals
  * Experience working with AWS tools
  * Experience with ETL tools, MLOps


  

**_Education_**
  

  * PhD in Computer Vision or similar


  

(ref:hirist.com)
title: Senior Supervisor/Manager - Computer Vision/Computer Vision
